post.body: so i am looking for like minded individuals who have computer  knowledge and are able to help me create a completely decentralized p2p file sharing network. Anyone interested?

comment.body: @katian: actually that looks very similar to what i want. But i am a little wary of a "one click do it all solution" so i was actually looking at this here: https://github.com/shalinc/Decentralized-P2P-File-Sharing-System
